snippet.title: [Subbed] Brothers Conflict Brilliant Blue Opening
snippet.description:
Translated by silvermoon249(http://silvermoon249.livejournal.com/46178.html#cutid1)
EDIT: Whoops, I didn't notice one of the subs have white font instead of black. ^_^;; Sorry about that.
EDIT2: Maybe someday I'll reupload this along with Passion Pink opening with HD quality that the Vita remake uses.
Wow, this opening clearly different than Passion Pink. I like it(now if only Passion Pink opening is something like this...). Unlike Passion Pink, this is released in 2013, some time after the anime finished I think. I don't know much about the game since I haven't played it myself. From the PV I watched, the game looks slightly different than Passion Pink, but I don't know for sure. Also, at 0:16 is the summary of Brothers Conflict, if you don't know about Brothers Conflict at all, reading it will give you a good idea about the story(more or less). :) I would like to sub the text when the guys appear, but I don't know Japanese. :( If someone kind enough wants to translate them, it would be appreciated. :) Well, enjoy! :D
Song: JEALOUSNESS
Singer:
Suzumura Ken'ichi - Asahina Tsubaki's seiyuu
Toriumi Kousuke - Asahina Azusa's seiyuu
Maeno Tomoaki - Asahina Natsume's seiyuu
I think that's all for Brothers Conflict(maybe I sub another BroCon related stuff again sometimes), I want to sub AMNESIA openings now~ But before that, I need to get some sleep...
